name: Break Bounce
description:
Click and drag to create platforms that bounce DanBall! Prevent DanbBall from touching obstacles and harmful borders in order to beat your highscore.

Features:
- Simple gameplay with a fun challenging twist
- Multiple unique environments and backgrounds
- Icicle, Fireball, Tornado, and Lightning obstacles
- Google Leaderboards
- Enable/Disable features such as vibration, music/sound, and game effects
- Haptic feedback that vibrates when DanBall bounces
